statements: DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 10 AND full_name = 'John Doe' AND condition = 'Recovered';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE dob < '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Visits WHERE visit_id = 1 AND patient_id = 100;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM Medical_Records WHERE diagnosis = 'Heart Disease';
DELETE FROM Appointment_Records WHERE location = 'Hospital A' AND appointment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
